snippet: Mr. North provided the producers of “The Americans” with so much detail and color for an upcoming episode that he earned a story credit.
abstract: Oliver North, former Marine Corps lieutenant colonel and central figure in Iran-contra scandal, acted as consultant on episode of FX television espionage thriller The Americans; episode deals with American government's covert efforts to help contra rebels in Nicaragua; North's involvement in show has raised possibility of opening old political wounds and protests that he is benefiting from his questionable actions.
lead_paragraph: Mr. North provided the producers of “The Americans” with so much detail and color for an upcoming episode that he earned a story credit.

headline.main: Oliver North, Now in the Service of TV’s K.G.B.
headline.print_headline: Oliver North, Now in the Service of the K.G.B.
